talk_1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_00>Look around you! None of this is naturally
occurring, right?<sp:5:0:0> And do you see that?
That's a <clr:0000>construct<clr:ffff>! They're really real!
talk_1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Which means this is an <clr:0000>abandoned mine<clr:ffff>!
I know that doesn't sound exciting, but
they're the crown jewels of the Depths!
Not only are they full of <clr:0000>crystallized
charges<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0> but if you talk to a <clr:0000>construct<clr:ffff>,
I hear they'll give you treasure! <sp:5:0:0>So yeah!
talk_1040:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Ease_01>Or kill the only other person who knows
about my discovery?
talk_1041:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Ah, great timing! <sp:5:0:0>Get a load of this!


<snd:TalkPositive>Another <clr:0000>abandoned mine<clr:ffff>! Can you
believe it?!

There should be a big <clr:0000>crystallized charge<clr:ffff>
somewhere around here.<sp:5:0:0> If you're free,
would you mind taking a look?
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>There're more <clr:0000>constructs<clr:ffff> here too.<sp:5:0:0>
Wonder if we'll ever actually learn how
to activate 'em...
talk_1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I obviously can't let you take all these
riches from me, can I,<sp:5:0:0> Link?
talk_1042:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh, hey, check out this <clr:0000>abandoned mine<clr:ffff>!


There's gotta be a big <clr:0000>crystallized charge<clr:ffff>
around here somewhere. Mind helping
me look?
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>We can worry about the <clr:0000>constructs<clr:ffff> later.<sp:5:0:0>
Like,<sp:5:0:0> whenever we figure out how to
activate them, later.
talk_1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Ancient ruins, real <clr:0000>constructs<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0> This must
be an <clr:0000>abandoned mine<clr:ffff>!

<snd:TalkPositive_00>Oh, lucky day! What should I do first?<sp:5:0:0>
Mine <clr:0000>crystallized charges<clr:ffff>? Try asking a
<clr:0000>construct<clr:ffff> for its treasure?
